item.description:
Hi! This is just to let eveyone now that I will be playing at Cafe Atlantique on Saturday, May 18th from 6:30 to 9:30 PM. It is ALWAYS great to have some familiar faces in the crowd - and to make some new friends. If you could stop by - even for a little while - it would be greatly appreciated. As this is a public venue, feel free t o bring a friends, family or co-workers to enjoy the music, etc.    – the more, the merrier! 

 

ABOUT Tom Ferrara: Tom a member of Party Express! and will be your event host. Tom performs a classic selection of acoustic folk and mellow rock that includes a varied mix of artists from James Taylor, Jim Croce and The Beatles to Green Day, Dave Matthews and Collective Soul. Tom has performed a number of happy hours, open mic nights, private parties, benefits and festivals. For more, check out Tom at: http://www.facebook.com/TheCaptainRocks. 

ABOUT Cafe Atlantique: A European style cafe that offers a great selection of coffee, tea, paninis, salads, soups, crepes and baked goods, as well as wine and beer. Indoor and outdoor seating.  Live music, free wifi & weekly drink specials. You can find out more about Cafe Atlantique by visitng their Facebook page at: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Cafe-Atlantique/48606855845. Also, here's a link to YELP! with soem reviews, etc. http://www.yelp.com/biz/cafe-atlantique-milford.

 

Please help support live music!

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Night of Acoustic Rock
